capstone.element

Class PatternObstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • capstone.element.Element
      • capstone.element.DynamicObstacle
        • capstone.element.PatternObstacle
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class PatternObstacle
extends DynamicObstacle
    A dynamic obstacle following a finite-pattern similar to a finite-state-machine. Not really so good, especially in dense levels it's so common that a pattern obstacle will have such a pattern that it's just awkwardly stuck. So deprecated in favor of the IntelligentObstacle.

    • Field Detail

      • _patternPool

        private static Pattern[] _patternPool
        Deprecated. 
        The pool of patterns from which the PatternObstacle can choose from. Note that they use the shorthand mnemonics/strings that a Pattern can be constructed with, because life is too short to write `new Delta(+1, -1)` every god damn time.

      • _random

        private static java.util.Random _random
        Deprecated.

    • Method Detail

      • pattern

        public Pattern pattern()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        The current pattern of the obstacle.

      • changePattern

        public void changePattern()
        Deprecated. 
        Changes the current pattern of the obstacle to another random one.

      • _next

        protected Delta _next(Region region,
                      java.util.Set<Point> taken)
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the next safe Delta of the pattern. Safe in the sense that the next point of the obstacle (currentPoint + Delta) will not be outside the region and will not hit one of the taken points.
        Specified by:
        _next in class DynamicObstacle
        Parameters:
        region - The safe region in which the obstacle must stay.
        taken - The set of taken points.
        Returns:
        The safe Delta by which the point of the PatternObstacle can definitely be moved.

      • _randomPattern

        private Pattern _randomPattern()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        A random pattern from the pattern pool.
